long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cuss Free Browsing extension blocks the cuss words on the browser for a user. Parents can install this extension on their kids phone/pc so that they don't get exposed to cuss words even unintentionally.
